languages.text: Whenever the character deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy, that enemy suffers +1 stack of the degraded defence {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} for every 6 damage that the character has dealt. Whenever the character's ally attacks that enemy, they deal an additional +1% damage for each stack of degraded defence.
languages.original_text: Нанося противнику {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, персонаж накладывает на него +1 уровень {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}эффекта{/g} "брешь в обороне" за каждые 6 нанесенного урона. Атакуя эту же цель, союзник персонажа наносит ей +1% урона дополнительно за каждый уровень этого эффекта.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the character deals damage to an enemy, that enemy until end of combat gains 1 stack of the Degraded Defense effect for every 3 damage that the character has dealt. Whenever an ally attacks that enemy, they deal additional damage equal to the number of Degraded Defense.

Whenever the character deals damage to an enemy, that enemy suffers +1 stack of the degraded defence effect for every 3 damage that the character has dealt. Whenever an ally attacks that enemy, they deal additional damage equal to the number of degraded defence stacks.

Whenever the character deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy, that enemy suffers +1 stack of the degraded defence {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} for every 6 damage that the character has dealt. Whenever an ally attacks that enemy, they deal additional damage equal to the number of degraded defence stacks.

Whenever the character deals damage to an enemy, that enemy suffers +1 stack of the degraded defence effect for every 6 damage that the character has dealt. Whenever an ally attacks that enemy, they deal additional damage equal to the number of degraded defence stacks.

Whenever the character deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy, that enemy suffers +1 stack of the degraded defence {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} for every 6 damage that the character has dealt. Whenever an ally attacks that enemy, they deal additional damage equal to the number of degraded defence stacks.

languages.text: Cuando el personaje inflige {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} a un enemigo, el enemigo sufre +1 acumulación del {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}efecto{/g} defensa debilitada por cada 6 puntos de daño infligidos por el personaje. Cuando un aliado del personaje ataca a ese enemigo, inflige un +1 % de daño por cada acumulación de defensa debilitada.
languages.original_text: Whenever the character deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy, that enemy suffers +1 stack of the degraded defence {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} for every 6 damage that the character has dealt. Whenever the character's ally attacks that enemy, they deal an additional +1% damage for each stack of degraded defence.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el personaje inflige {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} a un enemigo, el enemigo sufre +1 acumulación del {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}efecto{/g} defensa debilitada por cada 6 puntos de daño infligidos por el personaje. Cuando un aliado del personaje ataca a es el enemigo, inflige un +1 % de daño por cada acumulación de defensa debilitada.

languages.text: このキャラクターが敵に{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える時、このキャラクターが与えたダメージ6ごとに、+1スタックの防御劣化{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}を付与する。味方がその敵を攻撃する時、防御劣化のスタック数ごとに追加ダメージ +1%を付与する。
languages.original_text: Whenever the character deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy, that enemy suffers +1 stack of the degraded defence {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} for every 6 damage that the character has dealt. Whenever the character's ally attacks that enemy, they deal an additional +1% damage for each stack of degraded defence.

traits.locale_text: このキャラクターが敵に{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える時、このキャラクターが与えたダメージ6ごとに、+1スタックの防御劣化{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}を付与する。味方がその敵を攻撃する時、防御劣化のスタック数ごとに追加ダメージ +1%を付与する。
このキャラクターが敵に{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える時、このキャラクターが与えたダメージ6ごとに、+1スタックの防御劣化効果を付与する。味方がその敵を攻撃した時、防御劣化の累積数に等しい追加ダメージを与える。

languages.text: 每当角色对敌人造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，此次攻击每造成6点伤害，目标就会获得1层“防御衰退”{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}。每当盟友攻击受影响的敌人时，目标每有1层“防御衰退”层数，此次攻击造成的伤害就会提高1%。
languages.original_text: Whenever the character deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy, that enemy suffers +1 stack of the degraded defence {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} for every 6 damage that the character has dealt. Whenever the character's ally attacks that enemy, they deal an additional +1% damage for each stack of degraded defence.

traits.locale_text: 每当角色对敌人造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，此次攻击每造成6点伤害，目标就会获得1层“防御衰退”{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}。每当盟友攻击受影响的敌人时，目标每有1层“防御衰退”层数，此次攻击造成的伤害就会提高1%。
每当角色对敌人造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，此次攻击每造成6点伤害，目标就会获得1层“防御衰退”效果。每当盟友攻击受影响的敌人时，都会造成额外伤害，等同于目标的“防御衰退”层数。

languages.text: Fügt der Charakter einem Gegner {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zu, erhält dieser Gegner für jeweils 6 Schaden, die der Charakter verursacht hat, +1 Stapel des {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}Effektes{/g} "Zersetzte Verteidigung". Attackiert der Verbündete des Charakters den Gegner, verursacht er zusätzliche +1 % Schaden für jeden Stapel "Zersetzte Verteidigung".
languages.original_text: Whenever the character deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy, that enemy suffers +1 stack of the degraded defence {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} for every 6 damage that the character has dealt. Whenever the character's ally attacks that enemy, they deal an additional +1% damage for each stack of degraded defence.

traits.locale_text: Fügt der Charakter einem Gegner {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zu, erhält dieser Gegner für jeweils 6 Schaden, die der Charakter verursacht hat, +1 Stapel des {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}Effektes{/g} "Zersetzte Verteidigung". Attackiert der Verbündete des Charakters den Gegner, verursacht er zusätzliche +1 % Schaden für jeden Stapel "Zersetzte Verteidigung".

languages.text: Chaque fois que le personnage inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} à un ennemi, ce dernier subit +1 cumul de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effet{/g} Défense dégradée par tranche de 6 points de dégâts qu'il subit. Lorsqu’un allié attaque cet ennemi, il lui inflige 1 % de dégâts supplémentaires par cumul de l’effet Défense dégradée..
languages.original_text: Whenever the character deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy, that enemy suffers +1 stack of the degraded defence {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} for every 6 damage that the character has dealt. Whenever the character's ally attacks that enemy, they deal an additional +1% damage for each stack of degraded defence.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que le personnage inflige des dégâts à un ennemi, celui-ci subit +1 cumul de l'effet Défense Dégradée par tranche de 3 points de dégâts qu'il inflige. Lorsqu'un allié attaque cet ennemi, il lui inflige un nombre de points de dégâts supplémentaires égal au nombre de cumuls de l'effet Défense Dégradée.

languages.text: Нанося противнику {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, персонаж накладывает на него +1 уровень {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}эффекта{/g} "брешь в обороне" за каждые 6 нанесенного урона. Атакуя эту же цель, союзник персонажа наносит ей +1% урона дополнительно за каждый уровень этого эффекта.
languages.original_text: Whenever the character deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy, that enemy suffers +1 stack of the degraded defence {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} for every 6 damage that the character has dealt. Whenever the character's ally attacks that enemy, they deal an additional +1% damage for each stack of degraded defence.

traits.locale_text: Нанося противнику урон, персонаж накладывает на него +1 уровень эффекта "брешь в обороне" за каждые 3 нанесенного урона. Атакуя эту же цель, союзник персонажа наносит ей дополнительный урон, равный числу уровней этого эффекта.

Нанося противнику урон, персонаж накладывает на него +1 уровень эффекта "брешь в обороне" за каждые 3 нанесенного урона. Атакуя эту же цель, союзник персонажа наносит ей дополнительный урон, равный числу уровней этого эффекта.

languages.text: Karakter, bir düşmana {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verdiğinde o düşman, karakterin verdiği her 6 puanlık hasar için +1 zayıflayan savunma {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}etkisine{/g} maruz kalır. Karakterin dost birimi, o düşmana saldırdığında her zayıflayan savunma birikimi için +%1 ilave hasar verir.
languages.original_text: Whenever the character deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy, that enemy suffers +1 stack of the degraded defence {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} for every 6 damage that the character has dealt. Whenever the character's ally attacks that enemy, they deal an additional +1% damage for each stack of degraded defence.
